availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Marcum (Kentucky soldier, 14th KY cav, USA)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farm hand and soldier. Son of Alfred Marcum and Joanna Marcum. Farm hand in Breathitt County, Kentucky in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Breathitt County in 1860. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as first sergeant from February 14, 1863 to March 24, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 341.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 174B.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 388.
